articles.author: Dr Alastair Gunn
articles.title: The closest planet to Earth? Probably not the one you're thinking of - BBC Science Focus Magazine
articles.description: There has recently been some confusion over which of the planets of the Solar System is closest to Earth.
articles.content:
The order of the planets in the Solar System, moving outwards from the Sun, hasnt changed.
Earth has Venus as the next planet inwards, towards the Sun, and Mars as the next planet going outwards fro… [+1536 chars]
